Package universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation

Provides group of annotations used across the Fragments library for simplified configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FragmentAnnotations.FieldProcessor
    Simple callback which allows processing of all declared fields of a desired class via FragmentAnnotations.iterateFields(FragmentAnnotations.FieldProcessor, Class, Class).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FragmentAnnotations
    Annotation utils for the Fragments library.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ActionBarOptions
    Defines an annotation for determining how an ActionBar should be set.
    ActionBarOptions.HomeAsUp
    Defines an annotation for determining set of allowed flags for ActionBarOptions.homeAsUp() attribute.
    ActionModeOptions
    Defines an annotation for determining how an ActionMode should be set.
    ContentView
    Defines an annotation for determining a layout resource that should be inflated as a root view.
    FactoryFragment
    Annotation type used to mark an int field that specifies an id of fragment provided by a specific BaseFragmentFactory.
    FactoryFragments
    Defines an annotation for determining set of Fragment ids that are provided by a specific FragmentFactory.
    MenuOptions
    Defines an annotation for determining how a Menu should be set.
    MenuOptions.Flags
    Defines an annotation for determining set of allowed flags for MenuOptions.flags() attribute.
    WebContent
    Defines an annotation for determining a content to be loaded into WebView.

Package universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation Description

Provides group of annotations used across the Fragments library for simplified configuration.
Author:
Martin Albedinsky
